mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ex_rate_info (STAT_CODE, STAT_NAME, ITEM_CODE1, ITEM_NAME1, ITEM_CODE2, ITEM_NAME2, ITEM_CODE3, ITEM_NAME3, ITEM_CODE4, ITEM_NAME4, UNIT_NAME, WGT, BASE_DATE, DATA_VALUE) VALUES ( #{statCode}, #{statName}, #{itemCode1}, #{itemName1}, #{itemCode2}, #{itemName2}, #{itemCode3}, #{itemName3}, #{itemCode4}, #{itemName4}, #{unitName}, #{wgt}, #{baseDate}, #{dataValue} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE DATA_VALUE = #{dataValue}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
